item.name: Coombe Farm Estate Wines
item.description: Coombe Farm Vineyard is owned by Pamela, Lady Vestey (Dame Nellie Melbas granddaughter), Lord Samuel Vestey and The Right Honourable Mark Vestey. The vineyard is planted to pinot noir (22ha), chardonnay (18ha), pinot gris (2.6ha), cabernet sauvignon (2ha), with smaller amounts of merlot and arneis; the rest of the vineyard is currently under development. The vast majority of the fruit is sold to eager winemakers in the region, with a small amount made for Coombe Farm. Exports to the UK.
